content.body: Can anyone explain to me what in the spec causes an error to be thrown in strict mode for `'abc'[2] = 'd'` but not for `abc[2]` nor `Object('abc')[2] = 'd'` ?
content.formatted_body: Can anyone explain to me what in the spec causes an error to be thrown in strict mode for 'abc'[2] = 'd' but not for abc[2] nor Object('abc')[2] = 'd' ?

content.body: String Exotic object `[[DefineOwnProperty]]` (https://tc39.es/ecma262/#sec-string-exotic-objects-defineownproperty-p-desc) doesn't seem to check if the `this` value is a primitive string or object wrapper
content.formatted_body: String Exotic object [[DefineOwnProperty]] (https://tc39.es/ecma262/#sec-string-exotic-objects-defineownproperty-p-desc) doesn't seem to check if the this value is a primitive string or object wrapper
